translations: 当……的教母；作……的女监护人

phrs.translation: n. 充当临死孩童教母的仙女

sentences.sentence: You have devoured all when you were standing godmother.
sentences.translation: 你去当教母的时候，把一切都吃光了。

sentences.sentence: "All good things go in threes," said she, "I am asked to stand godmother again."
sentences.translation: “好事成三呀，”她说，“又有人请我当教母了。”

sentences.sentence: All this, however, was untrue; the cat had no cousin, and had not been asked to be godmother.
sentences.translation: 然而，这一切都不是真的；这只猫没有表姐，也没有被请去做教母。
